title: Dwarf
contents: property | Dwarven Resistance | Adv on saving throws vs poison, and resistance to poison dmg.
property | Dwarven Combat Training | Proficiency with battleaxe, handaxe, light hammer, and	 warhammer.
property | Tools | One of the following: smith’s tools, brewer’s supplies, or mason’s tools.
property | Stone Cutting | Double proficiency to origin of stonework

title: Hill Dwarf
contents: property | Dwarven Toughness | Hit point maximum increases by 1 and increases by 1 every level

title: Elf
contents: property | Keen Senses | Proficiency with Perception skill
property | Fey Ancestry | Adv on saving throws vs being charmed and magic cannot put you to sleep
property | Trance | Sleep isn't needed, only 4 hrs of meditation

title: High Elf
contents: property | Elf Weapon Training | Proficiency with longsword, shortsword, longbow, shortbow
property | Cantrip | You know one cantrip of your choice from the wizards spell list. Intelegence is spellcasting modifier for it.
property | Extra language | Speak, read, and write one language of your choice

title: Halfling
contents: property | Lucky | When you roll a 1, you can re-roll and must use new result
property | Brave | Adv on saving throws vs being frightened
property | Halfling Nimbleness | You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours.

title: Lightfoot Halfling
contents: property | Naturally Stealthy | You can attempt to hide even when you are only obscured by a creature that is at least one size larger than you.

title: Dragonborn
contents: property | Draconic Ancestry | Choose dragon type: black, blue, brass, bronze, copper, gold, green, red, silver, white
property | Breath Weapon | Determined by draconic ancestry, save DC = 8 + Con + Prof. Creature takes 2d6 on fail, half on success, dmg increases by 1d6 at levels 6, 11th, and 16th
property | Damage Resistance | Resistance to damage type associated with your draconic ancestry

title: Human
contents: property | Ability Score | +1 Each Ability Score
property | Languages | Common and 1 extra language

title: Dragonborn Ancestry
contents: subtitle | Damage type, area & saving throw

title: Gnome
contents: property | Gnome Cunning | Adv on all Int, Wis, Cha saving throws against magic

title: Rock Gnome
contents: property | Artificers Lore | Double proficiency on History check related to magical items, alchemical objects or technical devices

property | Tinker | Proficiency with Tinker's tools. You can spend 10 GP and 1 hr to create a clockwork toy (AC 5 HP 1). The device ceases to function after 24 hours unless you spend 1 hr making repairs or spend an action to dismantle it, reclaiming the resources. You can have 3 such devices at a time.

title: Tinker Toys
contents: subtitle | Things a Tinker can make

property | Clockwork Toy | This toy is a clockwork animal, monster, or person, such as a frog, mouse, bird, dragon, or soldier. When placed on the ground, the toy moves 5 feet across the ground on each of your turns in a random direction. It makes noises as appropriate to the creature it represents.
property | Fire Starter | The device produces a miniature flame, which you can use to light a candle, torch, or campfire. Using the device requires your action.
property | Music Box | The device produces a miniature flame, which you can use to light a candle, torch, or campfire. Using the device requires your action.

title: Half-Elf
contents: property | Ability Score | +2 Cha & any other 2 +1
property | Fey Ancestry | Adv on saving throws vs being charmed and magic cannot put you to sleep
property | Skill Diversity | Gain proficiency in any two skills

title: Half-Orc
contents: property | Menacing | Proficiency in the Intimidation skill
property | Relentless Endurance | When you drop to 0 hp but are not outright killed, you can drop to 1 hp. You cannot use this feature again until you do a long rest

property | Savage Attacks | When you score a critical hit with a melee weapon attack, you can roll one of the weapon’s damage dice one additional time and add it to the extra damage of the critical hit.

title: Tiefling
contents: property | Hellish Resistance | Resistance to Fire damage

property | Infernal Legacy | You know the thaumaturgy cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the hellish rebuke spell as a 2nd-level spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the darkness spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
